channel.title: Diablo III
channel.description:
90% Certain it is going to be released at the Blizzard WWI on june 28th
www.diablofans.com are all over it, Blizzard have been giving hits and teasers on the new game.
This game is going to be bigger than WoW. no rly it will.

item.title: Diablo III
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

Billy: Don’t compare the number of players. WoW is constantly being worked on, and the last D2 update was on something like WRONG DATE.
When WoW came out, the number of players in D2 dropped like crazy, in about 3 days they were back to normal.
D2 is a really successful for such an old game. There are still tons of people buying D2 daily. I’d say the new game will at least put a big dent in the amount of players in WoW.

I really hope, if there is a new Diablo, that they don’t make the camera a rotational one. I like the top down view. It’s too much of a fast paced game to make it like that. I’d be happy with a D3 no matter what though.

Edit: My mistake, looks like Blizzard finally got a new patch out, but my point still stands as it did before.

Read full topic
